channel.title: Studio: Spinning Discs :: C# Web Development
channel.description: Although they look the same, the old optical discs—CDs and DVDs—are quite different from each other. Let’s use them as the focus for creating a new interface. Getting Ready Set up a local copy of the project: Visit the repository page for this project and fork it to create a copy under your own GitHub account. Open up the solution in Visual Studio to get started. Disc Project Overview In this activity, you will pair up to design a new custom interface and an abstract class.
